last_episode_to_air.name: Executioner of the Andes
last_episode_to_air.overview: In Ecuador, a spree killer is loose in the wild as cows and other livestock are being mutilated in terrifying ways and left uneaten. Could it be proof the mythical Andean Mountain Wolf could in have some basis in fact?

name: Legends of the Wild
overview: Wilderness experts Damian Duffy and Matt Hoffman set off to solve some of the most incredible mysteries of the natural world, from unexplained sea creatures spotted in Alaska to deadly attacks by an airborne predator in Papua New Guinea.
